cells.content:
**Notes**

* Store an ordered list of strings
* Not an array
* Implemented as doubly linked list
* Often used for timeseries data
* Should less use it as less performant algorithm

// LIST PUSH - LEFT & RIGHT
LPUSH list item1
RPUSH list item2
LPUSH list item0
// LIST LENGTH
LLEN list 
// LIST INDEX SEARCH
LINDEX list 0 
LINDEX list 1 
LINDEX list -1 

DEL list

LPUSH temp 10
RPUSH temp 12
RPUSH temp 18 
RPUSH temp 16 
RPUSH temp 21 
RPUSH temp 14 

// LRANGE by default takes index as start stop
LRANGE temp 0 5

DEL temp

LPUSH temp 10
RPUSH temp 12
RPUSH temp 18
RPUSH temp 18
RPUSH temp 12
RPUSH temp 16 
RPUSH temp 21 
RPUSH temp 14
RPUSH temp 12

// LPOS by default searches for index of element, return first find
LPOS temp 14
LPOS temp 21

// RANK is used for searching instance of specific place, 2 means 2nd instance
LPOS temp 12 RANK 2
// COUNT is used for finding index of first n matches
LPOS temp 12 COUNT 2
// MAX LENGTH is used for search first n elements
LPOS temp 12 MAXLEN 5


DEL temp

LPUSH temp 10
RPUSH temp 12
RPUSH temp 18
RPUSH temp 18

// Removes first element
LPOP temp 
// Removes first two elements
LPOP temp 2

// Removes last two elements
RPOP temp 2

DEL temp

LPUSH seat 10
LPUSH seat 12
LPUSH seat 14
LPUSH seat 15
LPUSH seat 14


LSET seat 1 18
LINDEX seat 1

LTRIM seat 1 3
LINDEX seat 0
LINDEX seat -1

DEL seat

LPUSH seat 10
LPUSH seat 12
LPUSH seat 14
LPUSH seat 10

LINSERT seat before 12 99 
LINSERT seat after 12 98 

LRANGE seat 0  -1

// Removing left to right 1 instance of 99
LREM seat 1 99
LRANGE seat 0  -1

// Removing right to left 2 instances of 10
LREM seat -2 10
LRANGE seat 0  -1

// Removing all intances of 10
LREM seat 0 98
LRANGE seat 0  -1

DEL seat

RPUSH reviews b1
RPUSH reviews b2

HSET books:b1 title 'GoodBook' year 2023
HSET books:b2 title 'OkBook' year 2024

SORT reviews BY nosort GET books:*->title

DEL reviews books:b1 books:b2
